title: Fly Go 4 App: Drone Controller
description: Take your Go Fly Control for drones to the next level with Fly App - Drone Camera. The ideal app to enhance your go 4 fly journeys and make every adventure unforgettable. Support 40+ Drone Models (Android Mobile SDK 4.17) Drone app is the most trusted support fly app for drone models such as: - Mini drone: Mini / Mini 2 / Air 2S, Mini 2 SE, Mini SE - Mavic drones: Mavic Mini / Mavic Mini 2 / Mavic Air / Mavic 2 / Mavic Air 2 / Mavic Air 2S, Mavic 2 Pro, Mavic 2 Zoom MAIN FEATURES Experience seamless flying with your Mini and Mavic drones, go 4, Fly, mavic and beyond. The UAV drone app provides effortless controls, advanced capabilities, and smooth integration, helping you unlock true potential of your drone. - Advanced Camera Settings: Take control of your shots with customizable camera settings, allowing you to fine-tune ISO, shutter speed, and white balance for the perfect capture. - Real-Time UAV Drone Tracking: Keep tabs on your drone’s exact location at all times with live GPS tracking, ensuring you always know where it is. - Seamless Photo & Video Export: Easily save and transfer your high-resolution photos and videos directly to your phone for quick access and sharing. - Live Weather Data: Stay informed with up-to-the-minute weather conditions directly in the app, ensuring safer and more accurate flights. - Fly Safe - No Fly Zones: Avoid restricted areas with real-time no-fly zone alerts, helping you fly safely and comply with regulations. - Waypoint Missions: Whether you're a beginner or experienced, smart flight simulator offers an intuitive tool for planning waypoint missions, fully compatible with Phantom drones and other drone UAV. - Panorama Mode: Easily capture stunning 360-degree panoramas, both horizontal and vertical, directly from your drone controller like a pilot in drone games. - Focus Mode: Simplified drone controller that automates yaw and gimbal movements, letting you concentrate on smooth horizontal navigation or UAV performance. *Compatible with almost model Android Mobile SDK 4.17: Mini 2, Air 2S, Mini 2 SE, Mini SE, Mavic Mini, Mavic Air, Mavic Air 2, Mavic 2 Pro, Deerc drone, Ruko drone, Tello drone... With Mavic models, there are some features our app hasn't supported yet: Low Battery Warning, Critical Low Battery Warning, Time to Discharge, Lock Gimbal When Shooting, Sync Gimbal with Aircraft Heading, Gimbal Mode. Preview media, Play media, On/Off Head LEDs & Camera Forward/Down (Mavic Air2S: double tap is C2, 1-tap is C1) DISCLAIMER: This app is neither an official DJI product nor affiliated with the DJI company.
descriptionHTML:
Take your Go Fly Control for drones to the next level with Fly App - Drone Camera. The ideal app to enhance your go 4 fly journeys and make every adventure unforgettable.

Support 40+ Drone Models (Android Mobile SDK 4.17)

Drone app is the most trusted support fly app for drone models such as:
- Mini drone: Mini / Mini 2 / Air 2S, Mini 2 SE, Mini SE
- Mavic drones: Mavic Mini / Mavic Mini 2 / Mavic Air / Mavic 2 / Mavic Air 2 / Mavic Air 2S, Mavic 2 Pro, Mavic 2 Zoom

MAIN FEATURES
Experience seamless flying with your Mini and Mavic drones, go 4, Fly, mavic and beyond. The UAV drone app provides effortless controls, advanced capabilities, and smooth integration, helping you unlock true potential of your drone.

- Advanced Camera Settings: Take control of your shots with customizable camera settings, allowing you to fine-tune ISO, shutter speed, and white balance for the perfect capture.

- Real-Time UAV Drone Tracking: Keep tabs on your drone’s exact location at all times with live GPS tracking, ensuring you always know where it is.

- Seamless Photo & Video Export: Easily save and transfer your high-resolution photos and videos directly to your phone for quick access and sharing.

- Live Weather Data: Stay informed with up-to-the-minute weather conditions directly in the app, ensuring safer and more accurate flights.

- Fly Safe - No Fly Zones: Avoid restricted areas with real-time no-fly zone alerts, helping you fly safely and comply with regulations.

- Waypoint Missions: Whether you're a beginner or experienced, smart flight simulator offers an intuitive tool for planning waypoint missions, fully compatible with Phantom drones and other drone UAV.

- Panorama Mode: Easily capture stunning 360-degree panoramas, both horizontal and vertical, directly from your drone controller like a pilot in drone games.

- Focus Mode: Simplified drone controller that automates yaw and gimbal movements, letting you concentrate on smooth horizontal navigation or UAV performance.

*Compatible with almost model Android Mobile SDK 4.17: Mini 2, Air 2S, Mini 2 SE, Mini SE, Mavic Mini, Mavic Air, Mavic Air 2, Mavic 2 Pro, Deerc drone, Ruko drone, Tello drone...
With Mavic models, there are some features our app hasn't supported yet: Low Battery Warning, Critical Low Battery Warning, Time to Discharge, Lock Gimbal When Shooting, Sync Gimbal with Aircraft Heading, Gimbal Mode. Preview media, Play media, On/Off Head LEDs & Camera Forward/Down (Mavic Air2S: double tap is C2, 1-tap is C1)

DISCLAIMER:
This app is neither an official DJI product nor affiliated with the DJI company.

Photos/Media/Files: modify or delete the contents of your USB storage
